page.title: 06Bwlch-y-groes school.
page.content: Bwlch-y-groes school is half a mile from the village of Bwlch-y-groes.The school was built in 1876.There are 29 pupils in the school and two teachers.The teachers are Mrs Bowen and the Headteacher is Mr Phillips.Mrs Wise is the Caretaker and Mrs Salmon is the school Cook.Mrs Stephens looks after us at lunchtimes.Most of the children speak Welsh.Only one child in our class can't speak Welsh,but two others can understand it and speak a little.Children start school when they are four years old and they leave at eleven years old to go to Preseli Secondary school.Children stay in the Infants class until they are seven and then they come to the Headteacher's class.The school is like a big family.I like coming to school very much.
